author: B.L. van der Waerden
summary: Van der Waerden thanks von Neumann for his letter and informs him that Dr. Strebel has applied for a Swiss stipendium to travel to America. He mentions keeping the application forms von Neumann sent in case the stipendium is not granted and Strebel needs to apply for 1954/55.
title: Strebel's Swiss Stipendium Application
